1.content: You are male or female
1.title: You are

choices: A young girl your age but tiny and has some fur
11412.content: You may have no family or friends but you atleast have a place to live in which is an abandoned warehouse. As your reading a new book which you stole you hear a knock on your door and you hear a female voice saying, "Please if anyones in there unlock the door it's cold and wet out here." you think to yourself well I haven't had company in well ever so you walk over and open the door to reveal...
11412.title: Alone

114121.content:
You look down to see a girl about your age and is roughly 3 feet smaller than you which is a surprise as your only 5 foot. Starting to shiver the girl says, "May I come in my house is 3 miles away I won't be able to get there without catching a cold." Showing you her big sad but wide eyes you say, "Sure." Thinking what's the worst that could happen, stepping away from the door letting her in. The girl takes off her rain coat and you take it and place it on a door handle while the girl proceeds to shake herself dry.

You turn around to see that she has brown fur on her hands which are paws and you weren't sure what the the rest of her was like but you guessed the same. You then give her a tour showing her the Kitchen, Living Room, Bathroom and the Bedroom. You tell her all the rest are spares and she nods her head then asks, "You don't own this place do you?" You reply, "Not legally but I have lived here for years." You then ask, "Why were you so far away from home?" she replys, "I was at the cinema but it's lonely going by yourself." You say, "If your going again sometime on your own and want company I will go with you." She replys, "Really!? I don't have many friends most people think I'm a freak." You reply, "Of course and your my only friend."

You both sit down on a sofa together and you turn on the tv which when you moved in to the place was surprised to find worked and started flicking through channels. You come to a movie and the girl says excitedly, "Ohh please keep this one on this is my favourite movie!" To your expectations it was a romance movie. You put the remote down and the girl snuggles up to you which surprised you considering you just met.
114121.title: A young girl your age but tiny and has some fur

1141211.content:
As the girl gets closer to you you put your arm around her and she smiles up at you. You say, "My names Kane." She replys, "Mines Lyra." you say, "That's a nice name." To which she blushes curling up closer to you giggling. You put your hand up the back of her shirt and stroke her furry back to which she starts making a purring noise.

The movie comes to a end and you hear your stomach rumble and you say, "I'm going to get something to eat you want some?" She replys with, "What do you have?" You say, "Not much just bread." She says, "Well it seems to have stopped raining we could always go to my house and have a big dinner." You ask with excitement in your voice, "Are you serious, I have been eating bread for years." She says, "Yes I'm serious come on." As she puts her raincoat on again and you both head outside.

You start walking down the road passing 3 stores and lots of houses for 30 minutes and then you come to expensive mansions and you ask with disbelief in your voice, "You live here?" She says, "Yes my family is very wealthy." You come to a large house and she says, "Here we are." leading you up the drive she brings a key out of her pocket and opens the door removing any doubt in your mind and she shouts, "Mom, Dad I'm home." you hear them coming down the stairs she says, "There's someone I want you to meet."
1141211.title: During the film

info.brief_description: Story about love between a boy and girl
info.description:
No rape

Almost anything goes
